name: Kyogre
author: Kent Kanetsuna
flavor_text: It is said to have widened the seas by causing downpours. It had been asleep in a marine trench.

attacks.name: Drizzle
attacks.effect: Choose up to 2 basic {W} Energy cards from your hand and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: High Tide
attacks.effect: Discard 2 {W} Energy attached to Kyogre. This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
